errors.currency: Currency format must contain a valid amount variable

store_details.title: Store details
store_details.description: Details about your store will appear on your invoices

store_address.title: Store address
store_address.description: The physical address of the store will appear on your invoices

social.title: Social Networking
social.description: Social networking information your store uses online

tax.title: Tax override and tax sharing
tax.description: Shopify tax will be replaced with the tax values that you provide as a user, and multiple taxes application is possible
tax.warning: Total percentage of active tax items exceeds 100%

labels.use: Use tax override (must be enabled for custom taxes to take effect)
labels.unit_price: Calculate from unit price (otherwise, tax would be calculated from total price)
labels.name: Name

formats.title: Standards and Formats
formats.description: Standards and formats are used to format product prices and order times.

first_invoice_number.label: First Invoice Number
first_invoice_number.help: Select a custom invoice number to activate this field

header.title: Header Image
header.description: You can enable/disable this in the template customizer -> preview
header.message: Your image file must be less than 1MB and in the format: .jpg or .png.

signature.title: Signature Image
signature.description: You can enable/disable this in the template customizer -> footer -> signature
signature.message: Your signature file must be less than 1MB and in the format: .jpg or .png.

logo.message: Your logo file must be less than 1MB and in the format: .jpg or .png.

banner.title: Here you can add information about your store.
banner.body: The appearance of this information can be previewed and customized in the templates. Tip: Help your customers identify your brand by adding your logo to your invoice.
